TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SharePointCommandException extends System.Exception

summary.span: SharePoint 命令失败时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a SharePoint command fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *SharePoint 命令*是可用于在 SharePoint 工具扩展中调入 SharePoint 服务器对象模型的方法。*SharePoint commands* are methods that can be used in a SharePoint tools extension to call into the SharePoint server object model. 通过名为 vssphost4.exe 的 64 位进程执行 SharePoint 命令。SharePoint commands are executed by a 64-bit process named vssphost4.exe. Vssphost4.exe 中引发的任何异常返回到 SharePoint 命令的访问权限。Any exception raised in vssphost4.exe is returned to the SharePoint command as a . 有关 SharePoint 命令的详细信息，请参阅[调入 SharePoint 对象模型](/visualstudio/sharepoint/calling-into-the-sharepoint-object-models)。For more information about SharePoint commands, see [Calling into the SharePoint Object Models](/visualstudio/sharepoint/calling-into-the-sharepoint-object-models).

span.span: The message describing the error.

MemberSignature.Value: public SharePointCommandException (string message, Exception innerException);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: innerException

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 参数不为空引用（在 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 中为 ），则在处理内部异常的 块中引发当前异常。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not a null reference ( in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]), then the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误信息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that caused the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public SharePointCommandException (string message, string commandId, string fullTypeName, string originalStackTrace);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, string commandId, string fullTypeName, string originalStackTrace) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: commandId
param.span: 引发异常的命令的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the command that threw the exception.

param.name: fullTypeName
param.span: 引发异常的命令类的完整类型名称。

span.span: The full type name of the command class that threw the exception.

param.name: originalStackTrace
param.span: vssphost4.exe 进程中异常的原始堆栈跟踪。

span.span: The original stack trace of the exception in the vssphost4.exe process.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息、完整类型名称和原始堆栈跟踪来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message, full type name, and the original stack trace.

param.name: message
param.span: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: commandId
param.span: 引发异常的命令的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the command that threw the exception.

param.name: fullTypeName
param.span: 引发异常的命令类的完整类型名称。

span.span: The full type name of the command class that threw the exception.

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 参数不为是空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），则在处理内部异常的 块中引发当前异常。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not a null reference ( in Visual Basic), then the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息、完整类型名称、原始堆栈跟踪和对导致该异常的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message, full type name, the original stack trace, and a reference to the inner exception that caused the exception.
